member.name: M:CommentExample.solution(System.Double,System.Double,System.Double,System.Double)
member.example:
The following code:
let a = 1.0 let b = 0.0 let c = -1.0 let xp = (solution a b c +1.0) printfn "0 = %.1fx^2 + %.1fx + %.1f => x_+ = %.1f" a b c xp
prints 0 = 1.0x^2 + 0.0x + -1.0 => x_+ = 0.7 to the console.

member.name: M:CommentExample.discriminant(System.Double,System.Double,System.Double)
member.summary: The discriminant of a quadratic equation with parameters a, b, and c
